item.description:
Event rescheduled due to weather.

Inquisitive Minds has done an adventure on the Lost island, but not to Nantucket. Let's change that! 

We'll explore the shops and sights of Nantucket.  As a group we'll decide where to get a bite to eat.   

 

Meet at 12 noon on Nantucket island!

 

In order to allow people to choose between either the fast ferry or slow, or a mix, the plan is we'll meet at the ferry dock at noon.  I'll email my cell phone number to folks who have RSVPed yes.

 

We'll meet in front of the Steamship Authority ticket office (the dock where the Steamship Authority ferry arrives at, near Broad street).

If you arrive by the Hy-line ferry, you need to walk a couple of blocks from Straight Wharf.

 

Information on Nantucket: http://wikitravel.org/en/Nantucket

 

The Steamship Authority's fast ferry departs Hyannis at 8am & 11am. Return trips: 3pm, 6pm & 8:30pm.

The Steamship Authority's regular ferry, M/V Eagle, departs Nantucket at 9:15am, arrives Nantucket at 11:30am.  The return ferry departs from Nantucket at 5:30pm. To allow for time to shuttle from the parking lots to the departure dock, plan on being arriving in Hyannis about an hour early.

 

For more details, see Steamship Authority's web site: http://www.steamshipauthority.com/

 

For more details and schedule for Hy-line ferries:  https://hylinecruises.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Steanship Authority ticket office on Nantucket (on the ferry dock)
item.name: Nantucket Day Trip (rescheduled)
